title: Find f(x) based on f''(x), f'(1) and f(2) part - b

content.description:
Let f be the function that is defined for all real numbers x and that has the following properties.

(i) f″(x)=24x−18

(ii) f′(1)=−6

(iii) f(2)=0
content.question: Write an expression for f(x) .

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
